content: this is a summary of a legal case that took place in the district court in ljubljana the case involved two parties one owning a real estate property and the other owning movable equipment the procedure started on july 22 2014 and concluded on november 19 2015 lasting a total of 1 year 3 months and 28 days the court decided that the defendant must pay the plaintiff a sum of 90000 eur the value of the goods involved in the case is 370000 eur and the specific property in question is an apartment building garage and courtyard the court made its decision based on specific laws and principles the details of the settlement are confidential and there is no translation available

metadata.cost: Each party bears their own costs
